Title: Ep. 99 - Creating Lifehacker - Part II (Gina Trapani)
Description: Last episode we talked to Gina Trapani about her Lifehacker days. In this episode, we look to the future and hear about her work at Postlight, what it’s like to work with Paul Ford (Episode 82), and what she looks for when she’s hiring an engineer.
